hero.title: Hi, I'm Fazilabs
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer & AI Enthusiast
hero.description: I create amazing digital experiences using cutting-edge technologies. Passionate about building scalable applications and solving complex problems.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with over 5 years of experience creating digital solutions that make a difference. I specialize in modern web technologies and love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful designs.

experiences.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
experiences.description: Lead development of scalable web applications serving 100K+ users. Architected microservices infrastructure and mentored junior developers.
achievements: Reduced application load time by 40% through optimization
Led team of 5 developers on major product redesign
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 60%

experiences.title: Full-Stack Developer
experiences.description: Developed MVP from scratch for fintech startup. Built both frontend and backend systems handling financial transactions.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.description: Created responsive web applications for various clients. Collaborated with designers to implement pixel-perfect UIs.
achievements: Established component library for team reuse

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Features include user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard.

projects.title: AI-Powered Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time analytics dashboard with machine learning insights. Built with Next.js, Python Flask, and TensorFlow.

projects.title: Mobile Task Manager
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile app for task management with real-time collaboration features. Built with React Native and Firebase.

projects.title: Blockchain Voting System
projects.description: Secure voting platform using blockchain technology. Smart contracts built with Solidity and frontend with React.

projects.title: SaaS Project Management
projects.description: Multi-tenant SaaS application for project management with team collaboration, time tracking, and reporting features.

projects.title: IoT Smart Home Hub
projects.description: Smart home automation system with IoT device management, voice control, and mobile app integration.
